► BATTERY LIFE (4.0.0)
Huge update and redesign

We have completely redesigned the app and added new features, including:
• Battery charge/discharge notifications for your iPhone/iPad/iPod as well as your Apple Watch
• New Apple Watch compl

► BATTERY LIFE (4.0.0)
Huge update and redesign

We have completely redesigned the app and added new features, including:
• Battery charge/discharge notifications for your iPhone/iPad/iPod as well as your Apple Watch
• New Apple Watch compl

► BATTERY LIFE (4.1.0)
Version 4.1.0 saves the last (received) battery state from external devices.
You can also view this battery state from the Watch App.
